thread.title: Hammered by snow: Lake effect blast hits Genesee and Wyoming counties | Highway | thedailynewsonline.com
thread.title_full: Hammered by snow: Lake effect blast hits Genesee and Wyoming counties | Highway | thedailynewsonline.com

author: MATT SURTEL
title: Hammered by snow: Lake effect blast hits Genesee and Wyoming counties | Highway | thedailynewsonline.com
text:
BATAVIA — Heavy snows. Slippery roads. Whiteouts.
Genesee and Wyoming counties were hit with yet another winter blast Thursday and lake effect snows hammered much of Western New York.
